topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

topics.body:
There's this Mecha show that I recently found that I gave a watch.

Called Cross Ange: Tenshi to Ryuu no Rondo 

Couldn't watch anymore after the first episode.

You know those shows that try to be too edgy? Like how some people hate Attack on titan for trying to be edgy?

Well this show tries too fucking hard.

The first episode literally the ending of the first episode shows the main protagonist, who is female by the way, get sexual violated. and that's how it ends!

And the way this seen plays out is fucking creepy. Like its reeeeeaaally creepy and weird.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body: You know what I really love as a concept? Modern day weapons and tactics kicking the shit out of fantasy worlds. It's like "Guys there's a fucking dragon! What do we do?!" And then here comes an Apache helicopter that starts tearing the dragon to shreads with it's 30 mm chain gun. "Your scales were no match for bullets BITCH!"
